title: Gentle Wife: Revenge of the Slut
overview: Joo-man starts an affair with the younger Jin-nyeo and drives out his wife, Soon-jeong. Soon-jeong, who was kicked out to an empty house, meets a robber, Do-sik. At first, she was bullied by Do-sik, but she turned it around and began abusing him instead. Do-sik suddenly falls in love with Soon-jeong, and the two eventually plot to kidnap Joo-man and Jin-nyeo.
